name: qjrwebwinform-frontend
description: QJR Web Winform Frontend - Vue 2 Application

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const os=require('os');const dirs=['node_modules/.cache','node_modules/@vue/cli-service/.cache','node_modules/.vite','dist','../src/QJRWebWinform.WPF/wwwroot'];const userCache=path.join(os.homedir(),'.npm','_cacache');dirs.forEach(p=>{try{const fullPath=path.resolve(__dirname,p);if(fs.existsSync(fullPath)){fs.rmSync(fullPath,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('✓ Cleaned:',p)}else{console.log('⊘ Not found:',p)}}catch(e){console.error('✗ Error cleaning',p,':',e.message)}});if(fs.existsSync(userCache)){try{fs.rmSync(userCache,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('✓ Cleaned npm global cache:',userCache)}catch(e){console.error('✗ Error cleaning npm cache:',e.message)}}console.log('\n清理完成！请运行 npm run build 重新构建。')"
scripts.clean:all: npm cache clean --force && npm run clean
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
